category.name: Language
category.category_description: Defines parameters for the session langage.

preference.name: TC_language_force_thin_client_locale_no_warning
preference.preference_description: Suppresses the error message that warns the user that the default language is being used. The TC_language_force_thin_client_locale_no_warning preference can be used only when the TC_language_force_thin_client_locale preference is set to true. Valid Values: true - Suppresses the default language warning message. false - Allows the default language warning message to display each time the thin client is launched.
